OOC: I'm not sure what weapons there were so I'm going to guess.

BIC:  TT walks over and examines the reamins of a laser cannon.

TT: Well, it won't stop him or even slow him down but it might warn me 
when he gets here.  Not that it'll matter without the right weapons.

He starts to modify it into a VERY long range radar.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Sorry.
> 
> BIC:  Upon realizing Maximal city had gone up in smoke TT sent out 
> another message.
> 
> TT:  ARE ANY MAXIMALS LEFT AROUND HERE!  I NEED TO FIND ANOTHER 
> MAXIMAL BASE!  WE ARE ALL IN EXTREME DANGER!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: I haven't decided on all his brothers details yet, but let's 
> just 
> > say he's a copycat when it comes to his plan and is probably the 
> > leader of the operation (and probably knew Beast Wars Megatron).
> > 
> > BIC: He sends out a message.
> > 
> > TT:  This is former Maximal unit Turntail.  This is an emergency. 
 I 
> > need help.  I can't explain right now just let down the shields.

beyond

name

if

great
